title: Illaoi's Void Bringer skin question
body: It's one of those skins that'll go on sale again sometime in the future right? not anytime soon but just curious Ik theres some exceptions to what'll go on sale and I don't think this is one of em its only 1350 i think the ultimates don't go on sale I'm right in my thinking right?

replies.body: Yup, she'll be eligible for sales! The new pricing discounts can be found [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts). :]
Yes it will go on sale eventually and only ultimate end legendary skins do not go on sale but that is that the change in July I think
Why would you want that trash skin?
